definition: to burn incense at a temple

sentences.english: In May, people tour the Gold Fish Pond, offer incense at Zhongding and the Yaowang (God of Medicines) Temple.
sentences.chinese: 五月游金鱼池，中顶进香，药王庙进香。

sentences.english: In May, people tour the Gold Fish Pond, offer incense at Zhongding and the Yaowang (God of Medicines) Temple.
sentences.chinese: 五月游金鱼池，中顶进香，药王庙进香。

sentences.english: Since the year you and her on the first date, together go to temple pilgrimages .
sentences.chinese: 新年以来你和她第一次约会，一起去庙里进香。

sentences.english: Visitors to my temple like to get problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 好多人来庙里进香，是想要带问题回去研究的。

sentences.english: Early in the morning went Jimingsi incense; eat a bowl of vegetarian Jimingsi famous face.
sentences.chinese: 清晨先去鸡鸣寺进香，吃一碗鸡鸣寺著名的斋面。

sentences.english: Pilgrimage after the New Year give grandparents and uncles.
sentences.chinese: 进香过后，就给祖父母及叔叔们拜年。
